content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Dear Nesibe, thank you for coming to see my apartment in New York. I appreciate your interest, and I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. Based on the size of the apartment, which is 25 square meters, I was thinking of renting it for a monthly price of 1200 Euros. Is that a fair price in your opinion?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate the price. I think it's too high. Can you give me a lower price?

I am a student, so I don't have a lot of money. I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

I am also very responsible and dependable, so I would like to be on good terms with my landlord. I just need a good deal for me.

I have seen other apartments in the area, and they are being rented for a lower price. So I would like to negotiate the price.

Can you give me a lower price? I would appreciate it if you could lower the price to 1000 Euros per month.

I hope we can come to an agreement and I can rent the apartment.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Dear Nesibe, thank you for expressing your interest in renting the apartment. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, and I'm open to discussing a lower rental price that works for both of us.

I understand that as a student, you may be on a budget, and I want to be fair to you. However, I must emphasize that the rental price I initially proposed is based on the market value of similar apartments in the area.

After considering your request, I would be willing to lower the rental price to 1100 Euros per month. This is a fair price that takes into account the size of the apartment and the current market value.

I hope this is a price that works for you, and we can come to an agreement. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1100 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding and flexibility.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a fair price. I am excited to move into the apartment and start my new life in New York.

Thank you again for your time and consideration.

Best regards,

Nesibe Trabelsi
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Dear Nesibe, I'm glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 1100 Euros per month. I appreciate your understanding and flexibility, and I'm glad to hear that you are excited to move into the apartment and start your new life in New York.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,

Heinrich Heine
